name: Zombie Waves (AzazelUP)
description:
Zombie Waves is a post-apocalyptic survival game. The goal is to survive the gradually getting stronger zombie waves. During the game, you have the possibility to use items and upgrades, to keep you alive for a longer period, if properly used.

As mentioned earlier, zombie waves is a survival game, where the goal is to survive as long as possible, and kill as many zombies as possible, along the way.
The zombies are coming to destroy the fence, and get to you. Surviving is hopeless when the fence is destroyed and that's exactly the reason why you need to protect it.

For starting, there are a few types of attacking zombies. They all have various speed, life and damage. The strongest is the Ancient Zombie, which is capable of summoning smaller zombies...

The zombies are gradually getting stronger, so it all depends on our skills for how long can we survive.
